00189 {
00190    const char *string;
00191 
00192    switch (GET_MSG(msg)) {
00193    case kC_COMMAND:
00194       switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) {
00195       case kCM_BUTTON:
00196          switch (parm1) {
00197          case 1:
00198             if (fRetStr)
00199                strcpy(fRetStr, fBLabel->GetString());
00200             CloseWindow();
00201             break;
00202          case 2:
00203             fRetStr[0] = 0;
00204             CloseWindow();
00205             break;
00206          }
00207          break;
00208 
00209       default:
00210          break;
00211       }
00212       break;
00213 
00214    case kC_TEXTENTRY:
00215       switch (GET_SUBMSG(msg)) {
00216       case kTE_TEXTCHANGED:
00217          string = fBLabel->GetString();
00218          if (strlen(string) == 0)
00219             fOkButton->SetState(kButtonDisabled);
00220          else
00221             fOkButton->SetState(kButtonUp);
00222          break;
00223       case kTE_ENTER:
00224          if (fRetStr)
00225             strcpy(fRetStr, fBLabel->GetString());
00226          CloseWindow();
00227          break;
00228       default:
00229          break;
00230       }
00231       break;
00232 
00233    default:
00234       break;
00235    }
00236
